jsondiscoverer.web

Class StatusServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • jsondiscoverer.web.AbstractJsonDiscoverer
          • jsondiscoverer.web.StatusServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/status")
public class StatusServlet
extends AbstractJsonDiscoverer
    Simple servlet to know the versions of other servlets

    This servlet is used just as maintainance to check that everything is working properly in the servlet side.

    Author:
    Javier Canovas (me@jlcanovas.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      protected void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)

    • Method Detail

      • doGet

        protected void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
              throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Returns the value of several options:
        • The value for the AbstractJsonDiscoverer.serverURL
        • The working dir (stored in AbstractJsonDiscoverer.workingDir
        • The ids used by the different servlets (see JsonInjectorServlet.INJECTOR_ID, JsonSimpleDiscovererServlet.SIMPLEDISCOVERER_FOLDER JsonAdvancedDiscovererServlet.ADVANCEDDISCOVERER_FOLDER).
        Overrides:
        doGet in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        req - The Request of the call
        resp - The Response to the call
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        HttpServlet.doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse)
